pr_title: Include TLSv1.3 ciphers as recommented ciphers for HTTP2

timeline.message:
Include TLSv1.3 ciphers as recommented ciphers for HTTP2

Motivation:

We should include TLSv1.3 ciphers as well as recommented ciphers these days for HTTP/2. That is especially true as Java supports TLSv1.3 these days out of the box

Modifications:

- Add TLSv1.3 ciphers that are recommended by mozilla as was for HTTP/2
- Add unit test

Result:

Include TLSv1.3 ciphers as well

timeline.author: slandelle
slandelle

timeline.bodyText: Not found of assertTrue without an explicit error message: failures are very hard to read.
